Package net.minecraftforge.client.event

Class GuiScreenEvent.PotionShiftEvent

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
net.minecraftforge.client.event.GuiScreenEvent
net.minecraftforge.client.event.GuiScreenEvent.PotionShiftEvent
Enclosing class:
GuiScreenEvent
public static class GuiScreenEvent.PotionShiftEvent extends GuiScreenEvent
This event fires in EffectRenderingInventoryScreen in the checkEffectRendering method when potion effects are active and the gui wants to move over. Cancel this event to prevent the Gui from being moved.
